cast.overview: High school student Shun Takahata is bored. Bored with the day-to-day monotony of school and life, he prays for change, for something exciting. Suddenly, he and his classmates are forced to play deadly children's games and facing terrifying creatures from a talking Daruma doll to a sharp-clawed lucky cat.
cast.title: As the Gods Will

also_known_as: かわむら りょうすけ
details.biography: Ryôsuke Kawamura (川村 亮介, Kawamura Ryōsuke, born April 6, 1991) is a Japanese actor from Kanagawa Prefecture. He is 177 cm tall. His special skills are karate, baseball (his position is pitcher) and playing musical instruments such as guitar, bass and drums. His other special skills include boxing, darts and billiards.
details.name: Ryôsuke Kawamura
